sentences.english: The private key is used to access the Bitcoins kept in the payor's account.
sentences.chinese: 私鑰用於訪問比特幣付款人的賬戶。

sentences.english: Otherwise again carry will automatically withdrew to form currency.
sentences.chinese: 否則再次提現將自動退到報單幣。

sentences.english: Method of payment for all other fees will be in Singapore dollar .
sentences.chinese: 其他課程費與額外費用的付款貨幣是新加坡幣。

sentences.english: The soldiers will be paid in coin or green backs as the case may be.
sentences.chinese: 士兵的薪餉是發硬幣還是美鈔，視情形而定。

sentences.english: The undated Cheh-Kiang coins must have been made up at that time.
sentences.chinese: 無日期的浙江幣一定也是在那時鑄造的。

sentences.english: All fees are payable by cash, Nets, Giro or cheque in Singapore dollar.
sentences.chinese: 課程費用的付款貨幣是新加坡幣。

sentences.english: During that year, the U. S. mint released four new pennies.
sentences.chinese: 在那一年，美國鑄幣廠發行四個新便士幣。

sentences.english: I wish to change some British sterling into Renminbisexual.
sentences.chinese: 我想把一些英鎊換成黎民幣。

sentences.english: The Parable of the Talents is one of thestories Jesus told to teach a moral lesson.
sentences.chinese: 塔蘭特幣寓言是耶穌用來教導道德的故事之一。

sentences.english: All the clever cryptography means BitCoin dealings are difficult to trace.
sentences.chinese: 所有聰明的密碼學家都表示跟蹤比特幣交易很困難。

sentences.english: They would immediately be twice as expensive now that they would have to be repaid in devalued drachmas.
sentences.chinese: 他們立刻會變成他們需要用希臘幣償還數額的兩倍。

sentences.english: There is some debate around whether Bitcoin is a currency or commodity.
sentences.chinese: 現在有關於比特幣究竟是貨幣還是商品的爭論。

sentences.english: As a result, people must continue to build powerful and massive computers to aquire the currency.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人們必須建立龐大的計算機系統來獲取比特幣。

sentences.english: The first is the target of livestock, followed by cloth millet, finally coins.
sentences.chinese: 其對象首先是牲畜，其次是布粟，最後爲幣。

sentences.english: Two workers put the finishing touches on a monument to the Spanish peseta in southern Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙南部兩名工人完成西班牙幣紀念碑。

sentences.english: Enter Bitcoin, the online virtual currency.
sentences.chinese: 於是，網絡虛擬貨幣“比特幣”悄然登場。

definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
